<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns unit's backpack

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''unitBackpack''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _myBackpack = [[unitBackpack]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[clearMagazineCargo]] [[unitBackpack]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[action]] ["gear", [[unitBackpack]] [[player]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[backpackContainer]], [[firstBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpack]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[removeBackpack]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[loadBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Apr 29, 2014 - 15:49</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In <template><title>arma3</title></template> ver 1.16, we can use either [[backpackContainer]] or [[unitBackpack]] at present since both of them enjoy same operand type and return value.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
